resources.name: Update Item
Create Item
Create Restaurant
resources.description:
Receive the relevant information of the restaurant and create a new registration of it in the base. Check that it does not exist before inserting. In addition to all the data you deem relevant, the restaurant must have a type of cuisine (Arabic, Brazilian, Chinese, French, seafood, vegetarian, Italian, pizza, hamburger, snacks, etc.).
<!-- RESPONSE 200 -->
{
  "name": "Ponto Jovem 6",
  "city": "São Paulo",
  "address": "Rua João Nobile, 74 Conjunto Habitacional Assis IV",
  "typeCuisine": "Arábe",
  "lat": -222.6422,
  "long": -50.412497,
  "id": 5,
  "createdAt": "2020-11-06T18:57:26.608Z",
  "updatedAt": "2020-11-06T18:57:26.608Z"
}
<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->
<!-- RESPONSE 400 -->
{
  "status": "error",
  "message": "There is already a registered restaurant with that name!"
}
<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

body.text:
{
	"name": "Ponto Jovem 8",
	"city": "São Paulo",
	"address": "Rua João Nobile, 74 Conjunto Habitacional Assis IV",
	"typeCuisine": "Arábe",
	"lat": -222.6422,
	"long": -50.412497
}

resources.name: List Restaurants
resources.description:
Given the parameters, bring only the restaurants that have a match. The parameters can be:
City: Receive a city and return the registered restaurants in that city
Distance: Receives lat and lng and a radius (in kilometers) and returns only restaurants within the region
Type of cuisine: receives the type of cuisine and returns the restaurants of that type
Dish: receives anything the customer types related to the dishes registered (eg stroganoff) and brings restaurants that have related items.
<!-- RESPONSE 200 -->
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Extrogonofe com Carne",
    "city": "Assis",
    "address": "Rua João Nobile, 74 Conjunto Habitacional Assis IV",
    "type_cuisine": "Arábe",
    "lat": "-222.642200",
    "long": "-50.412497",
    "created_at": "2020-11-06T03:37:16.819Z",
    "updated_at": "2020-11-06T03:45:43.000Z",
    "description": "Extrogonofe com Frango Grelhado com molho vermelho/branco",
    "price": "50.20",
    "restaurant_id": 4
  },
  {
    "id": 2,
    "name": "Extrogonofe com Carne",
    "city": "Assis",
    "address": "Rua João Nobile, 74 Conjunto Habitacional Assis IV",
    "type_cuisine": "Arábe",
    "lat": "-222.642200",
    "long": "-50.412497",
    "created_at": "2020-11-06T19:10:37.437Z",

    "price": "50.20",

  }

<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->
<!-- RESPONSE 400 -->
